frontendHiddenPathList.description: Sections of metadata (defined as paths) to be hidden from the front-end.

frontendNonAdminHiddenPathList.description: Sections of metadata (defined as paths) to be hidden from the front-end for non-admin users.

additionalBuilderClassNameList.description: Additional builders. Allows adding conditional metadata. Should implement Espo\Core\Utils\Metadata\AdditionalBuilder. As of v8.4.

aclDependencies.description: Rules making a metadata sections available for the user when they don't have access to the scope.

additionalProperties.description: A metadata path, items are separated by dots.

scope.description: If the user has access to the scope, they will have access to the metadata section defined by the key.

field.description: If the user has access to the field (of the scope), they will have access to the metadata section defined by the key.

anyScopeList.description: If the user has access to any of the listed scopes, they will have access to the metadata section defined by the key. As of v9.2.5.
